Layer.InitCommand:
%melody(function(self) if self:getaux()==1 then return end; self:aux(1); -- initcommand bs
if version_minimum('V4') then -- Only activates if the file is made for V4 and future builds.
screen = self
screen:diffuse(0,0,0,0) -- whee
screen:xyz(0,0,0) screen:zoomx(1) screen:zoomy(1) screen:rotationz(0)
local condor = {} condor.const1 = math.sqrt(math.pow(SCREEN_WIDTH / 2, 2) + math.pow(SCREEN_HEIGHT / 2, 2)) condor.const2 = 180 + math.deg(math.atan(SCREEN_HEIGHT / SCREEN_WIDTH))
if version_minimum('V4.0.1') then -- GetEffect fixed
update_hooks['screen'] = function()
local zx = screen:GetCurrentZoomX() local zy = screen:GetCurrentZoomY() local zr,zg,zb,za = screen:getdiffuse()
--
local ts = SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen() ts:rotationz(screen:GetEffectRotationZ()) ts:zoomx(zx) ts:zoomy(zy) ts:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + screen:GetEffectX() + zr + (condor.const1 * zx * math.cos((screen:GetEffectRotationZ() + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y + screen:GetEffectY() + zg + (condor.const1 * zy * math.sin((screen:GetEffectRotationZ() + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:z( screen:GetEffectZ() + zb )
end
else
update_hooks['screen'] = function()
local zx = screen:GetCurrentZoomX() local zy = screen:GetCurrentZoomY()
local zr,zg,zb,za = screen:getdiffuse()
--
local ts = SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen() ts:rotationz(screen:GetEffectRotationZ()) ts:zoomx(zx) ts:zoomy(zy) ts:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + screen:GetEffectX() + zr + (condor.const1 * zx * math.cos((screen:GetEffectRotationZ() + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y + screen:GetEffectZ() + zg + (condor.const1 * zy * math.sin((screen:GetEffectRotationZ() + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:z( screen:GetEffectY() + zb )
end
end
else
screen = {}
screen.x = 0 screen.y = 0 screen.z = 0 screen.rotation = 0 screen.zoom = 1 screen.zoomx = 1 screen.zoomy = 1
local condor = {} condor.const1 = math.sqrt(math.pow(SCREEN_WIDTH / 2, 2) + math.pow(SCREEN_HEIGHT / 2, 2)) condor.const2 = 180 + math.deg(math.atan(SCREEN_HEIGHT / SCREEN_WIDTH))
update_hooks['screen'] = function()
local zx = screen.zoomx * screen.zoom local zy = screen.zoomy * screen.zoom -- local ts = SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen() ts:rotationz(screen.rotation) ts:zoomx(zx) ts:zoomy(zy) ts:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + screen.x + (condor.const1 * zx * math.cos((screen.rotation + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y + screen.y + (condor.const1 * zy * math.sin((screen.rotation + condor.const2) / 180 * math.pi))) ts:z( screen.z )
end
self:hidden(1)
end end)
